definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Welted hand pockets on plaid side.
Zippered welt pockets at the chest and hips.
sentences.chinese: 拉链贴边口袋在胸部和臀部。

sentences.english: Side-seam pockets, buttoned back welt pockets.
sentences.chinese: 侧缝口袋，搞定回的贴边口袋。

sentences.english: Black Storm welt and Black welt stitch.
sentences.chinese: 黑风暴伟力和黑贴边缝合。

sentences.english: Angled hand welt pockets, buttoned welt pockets at the back.
sentences.chinese: 角度的手贴边口袋，搞定伟力在后面的口袋。

sentences.english: Angled hip pockets, button-through back welt pockets.
sentences.chinese: 斜角的臀部口袋，背面贴边口袋按钮。

sentences.english: Angled hand pockets with leather piping, back welt pockets.
sentences.chinese: 斜角手皮革滚边口袋，背面贴边口袋。

sentences.english: Welted zippered hand pockets on solid side.
sentences.chinese: 实边贴边拉链口袋的手。

definition: pressure crease/fig. to toil for sb else's benefit/line ball (i.e. on the line)
to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
checked pattern/square box character (in Chinese text) indicating illegible character
